Worry-free eyewear
protection plan

Life happens, even to your perfect pair. Get one year of coverage for the repair and replacement of your glasses and rest easy knowing you’re covered.*

What you get

  • Replacement within 12 months of purchase
  • Prices start at $24.99 for single vision or non-prescription and $34.99 for progressive*
  • Redeem the plan via our customer service center. Chat with us or call 1-800-GLASSES (800-452-7737)

What’s covered

  • Cracked or scratched lenses
  • Cracked frames
  • What's covered normal wear and tear
  • Defects in materials & workmanship
  • See Terms and Conditions for plan details

Co-pays

  • Frame & lens service $50

How to purchase

  • Select your perfect pair
  • Add Eyewear Protection Plan** to your shopping cart
  • Your perfect pair is now covered!
SHOP EYEGLASSES SHOP SUNGLASSES

* Limitations and exclusions apply. See Terms and Conditions for full plan details. Co-pays apply.
** Term of your plan is one year plus two weeks to allow for delivery of your product.
